title: Biden to Announce His Supreme Court Nominee Friday Afternoon
sub_head: President has promised to nominate the first Black woman to the high court and interviewed three contenders
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”President Biden intends to announce his nominee to the Supreme Court Friday afternoon at the White House, according to a person familiar with the plan.
Officials said Thursday evening that Mr. Biden had reached a decision on his choice for the nomination. The president has promised to nominate the first Black woman to the high court and interviewed three contenders in recent days. She would succeed retiring Justice Stephen Breyer.
